dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: This rope. Hold on tight. ... Or sink.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Sunrise. Time to start work. Work hard.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Mermaid fin jerky. Good nosh. What, not good enough for you?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Nights are good. Sunset comes, before night comes. Shadow covers my body. Covers my tattoos.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: This... is shame. Engraved it myself, on my skin. Want to erase. But can't erase.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: The Middle branded my tongue. My speech. So I cut them up. Cut up my brain and my tongue. Did it to myself.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: This knot, called Desperate's Knot. Used in the Middle. Hard to undo.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Harpooneers kill Whale. Kill the Whale... and it'll be over. This voyage.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Never broke Captain's orders. Never. But no more. My way. Not her way. It's different now. Now... want to know my path.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: (Sounds of whetting a harpoon and tying ropes to it)

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: It is time. Time to kill the Whale. To destroy the Whale-heart. Time to escape.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Rope. Knot tight.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let's go. Let's kill.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Want me to tie knot again? Desperate's Knot?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Stab deep.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: That one. Slowed. Easy target.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Aagh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: End of voyage. Nearing.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Miss the sunset... the shimmering... sky...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Did it. Job done.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Can't do it. Someone else can do better.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Killed everyone. Let's return. To ship.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: No more heart beating. Even when all Whale hearts stop beating... to where I return?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Must build coffin. Send me away. Put me in the coffin. So at least my body... finds way back to Cathy. One day...
